metadata.Title: CVE-2022-23638 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: svg-sanitizer is a SVG/XML sanitizer written in PHP. A cross-site scripting vulnerability impacts all users of the `svg-sanitizer` library prior to version 0.15.0. This issue is fixed in version 0.15.0. There is currently no workaround available.

criterions.comment: spip: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
